content: Insurance Asked by AnonymousAsked on 03 Jan 2019Claim from insurer first or working company first?For hospitalisation claim, lets say both have certain claim limit,  who should i claim from first?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Loh Tat Tian, 2nd Hand Insurance Broker / EX-FA at Singapore Insurance Value FindingLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 04 Jan 2019Always claim from your company insurance first. Personal should always be claimed last. Hospitalisation claim for integrated shield plan follows you, and you may be slapped with higher premium payments. 0 comments0
